General.Name: Rover Metals Corp
General.Description: Rover Metals Corp., a precious metals exploration company, engages in acquiring, exploiting, exploring, evaluating, and developing mineral properties in North America. The company primarily explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. Its flagship property is the Cabin Gold project, a gold-in-iron formation property covering an area of approximately 1,503 hectares located in the Northwest Territories. Rover Metals Corp. incorporated 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, British Colombia.
General.Address: 938 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 1N9
